author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. pares 1-month bill sale to smallest since December
text:
NEW YORK, April 9 (Reuters) - The U.S. Treasury Department said on Monday it will sell $45 billion of one-month bills on Tuesday, which is the smallest amount on the weekly sale of this debt maturity since late December.
Later Monday, the Treasury will sell $48 billion in three-month T-bills and $42 billion in six-month T-bills. (Reporting by Richard Leong)
